regen.absent_element: validation or feedback after modifying characteristics
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide validation and feedback to the user after modification of simulation parameters to ensure compatibility and successful integration.
The system shall confirm to the user each modification made to the simulation parameters and rules to ensure changes are duly recorded and acknowledged.
The user shall be able to modify the simulation rules, including any conditions, constraints, or operational instructions relevant to the simulation.

label: The user shall be able to modify the simulation rules
absence: action of modify the simulation rules
